original_text: Crowds gathered also from the towns around Jerusalem, bringing their sick and those tormented by impure spirits, and all of them were healed.
korean_text: 예루살렘 부근의 수많은 사람들도 모여 병든 사람과 더러운 귀신에게 괴로움 받는 사람을 데리고 와서 다 나음을 얻으니라

sentences.original_text: Crowds gathered also from towns around Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 무리들이 또한 예루살렘 주변의 마을들로부터 모여들었고

sentences.original_text: and those tormented by impure spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 영들에게 고받는 사람들도 데리고 왔고

sentences.original_text: and all of them were healed
